name: Pain of Java
description:
Paul Ishman! Knows the Code. Jumps on Foes. Here he goes.

Paul ‘Rudy’ Ishman, as always, was trying to cover the whole material the day before the exam. However, programming in Java still felt a bit hazy to him. “Czeski film!” he shouted, heading for the bed. “I’ll learn more in the morning...”, he muttered and fell into a restless sleep full of questions and bugs....

Pain of Java is a game intended to teach both Polish and Javascript.

Use keys to move, click to jump.
